body_html:
I have fixed the error and tensorflow works with GPU! (with the help of stackover flow Iink) just re-installed everything. It worked.
One important thing is after pip install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu, it showed the same error. Thus, I used
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.10.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl Then it resolved the error by itself. Also, I was giving wrong $CUDA_HOME path.

body:
I have fixed the error and tensorflow works with GPU! (with the help of stackover flow [Iink)](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43162667/importerror-libcudart-so-8-0-cannot-open-shared-object-file-no-such-file-or-d) just re-installed everything. It worked. 
One important thing is  after` pip install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu`, it showed the same error. Thus, I used
`export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.10.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl 
` Then it resolved the error by itself. Also, I was giving wrong **$CUDA_HOME** path.
